mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(user_id, category_no, community_title, community_content, community_regdate) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{category_no}, "하이", #{community_content}, now())
INSERT INTO media(community_no, media_type, media_path) VALUES (#{community_no}, #{media_type}, #{media_path})
mapper.select: SELECT community.*, media.media_type, media_path, FROM community LEFT JOIN media ON community.community_no = media.community_no ORDER BY community.community_no DESC
